name: LDVR's (mostly terrible) Optik
description:
This was a thought I had that ended up being mostly terrible. Enjoy!

Steps:

  1. Lower expectations
  2. Lower them more
  3. Watch the video and then realize your expectations may not be low enough
  4. Gamble away some money on a lotto ticket
  5. Return to step 1 if expectations >0
  6. Proceed, on your way...
